pageContext.claim: “The Tulsa rally was incredible. Despite all of the horrible, ominous warnings that you people put out over a period of two weeks, the crowd was wonderful. It was a great -- they were warriors.”
pageContext.analysis: The warnings turned out to be justified, as health officials in Tulsa later linked Trump's campaign rally to a spike in covid-19 cases in the area. The crowd was sparse and much of the venue was empty.
